category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

result.title: Ethics Plan
result.description: An Ethics Plan will be developed to ensure overall ethics compliance of the project. To achieve this, the task leader will (a) review the project goals and analyse the expected outcomes of the project with respect to the impact on social groups and individuals; (b) establish proper ethical approach and relevant procedures towards carrying outthe project activities, considering applicable research models and patterns, data classifications, KPIs, etc.; and (c) establish a methodology for researching and creating the project tools considering the notions of educational technology, open access education and inclusiveness.Additionally, a risk assessment and protocol for managing ongoing monitoring of participant well-being during the trial will be included in this deliverable.

result.title: Project Management and Quality Guidelines
result.description: CSIC M2 This report will describe the projects internal management procedures defined in T11 detailing the projects quality assurance process as well as a detailed risk evaluation and internal communication tools and mechanisms The principles guiding these procedures will be agreed at the start of the project during the GA kickoff meeting M1

category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

result.title: Report on the SWOT
result.description: A report on the SWOT analysis provided as one of the tasks of this work package will also be published. This report, which will deepen the information shown with the first one, aims to explore the social, cultural, technological, pedagogical and political barriers, the weakest points of the current e-learning platforms, the users’ opinions, the existing policies in the field and the risks related to digital education that will emerge from the SWOT analysis.

result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: The DMP will be drawn up during the first 6 months of the project and updated along the project implementation, including information on: handling of research data during and after the end of the project; what data will be collected, processed and/or generated; which methodology and standards will be applied; whether data will be shared/made open access; and how data will be curated and preserved (including after the end of the project).Also, the ethics risks related to the data processing activities of the proposal/project will be evaluated and include a data protection impact assessment conducted under article 35 General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679.

category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding
